concept.title: Expression Output Fields
concept.shortdesc: When you configure a field expression, the Expression Evaluator writes the results of the expression to a field. You can use an existing field or create a new field.

conbody.p: Expression Evaluator processorexpression output fieldfield expression output fieldsExpression EvaluatorWhen you use an existing field, the Expression Evaluator replaces the incoming value with the new value. When you use a new field, the Expression Evaluator adds the new field to the record and passes the value of the expression.
